oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Dominion Barn Dance - Buck Owens and the Buckaroos - WRVA Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of an Old Dominion Barn Dance segment featuring Buck Owens and his Buckaroos (performers), on radio station WRVA (Radio Stations : Richmond, Va.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buck Owens and his Buckaroos
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- [Unidentified] talks and introduces Buck Owens and the Buckaroos -- Buck Owens talks -- Act Naturally (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens and the band talk and jokes with the audience -- Loves Gonna Live Here Again (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Together Again (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- My Heart Skips A Beat (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens introduces the band -- Orange Blossom Special (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Buck Owens and the band talk and joke with the audience -- Streets Of Laredo (Doyle Holly vocals, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Just As Long As You Love Me (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Touch Me (Doyle Holly vocals, Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Close Up The Honky Tonks (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) -- Truck Driving Man (Buck Owens and his Buckaroos) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WRVA (Radio station : Richmond, Va.); Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Buckaroos;
